About Braid

Not sure on what braid is, let me explain

Tutorials

Braid is a technical solution empowering developers to take control and tie content existing on other platforms / services into one unified and query-able API. Along with tying services into one place, it also gives people the additional ability to modify the data they pull in from these services. This gives users the ability to provide customizability to services that they wish it already provided. It enables people to quickly provide solutions that would either take valuable time to make, or perhaps simply donâ€™t have the understanding to make themselves.

Braid.io

Briad.io is brought to you by Paul Bird. Braid was Born and made out of frustration; I was that frustrated developer.
